mapper.select: select count(*) as count from TB_001 where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_001 (USER_ID,USER_PW, USER_NAME, USER_AGE, USER_EMAIL, USER_PHONE, USER_JOB, USER_AR, USER_AR_ZONECODE, USER_AR_DETAIL, USER_BANK, USER_BANK_ACCOUNT, USER_BANK_HOLDER) VALUES (#{user_id},#{user_pw},#{user_name},#{user_age},#{user_email},#{user_phone}, #{user_job},#{user_ar},#{user_ar_zonecode},#{user_ar_detail},#{user_bank}, #{user_bank_account},#{user_bank_holder})
